title: UAV borne SATCOM
explain:
UAV borne SATCOM Power Amplifier Combination

UAV borne SATCOM Power Amplifier Combination is used to convert C-band IF signal into Ku-band RF signal, and complete power amplification.
cont:
• Input frequency: 2.5GHz～3.0GHz
  • Output frequency: 14.0GHz～14.5GHz
  • Data record and playback
  • 1dB compression point output power: ≥60W (+48dBm)
  • Gain:≥69dB
  • Dimension: 326mm×231mm×144mm(L×W×H)
  • Weight: ≤8.4kg
  • Power consumption: ≤450W
  • DC 28V

UAV borne SATCOM Power Amplifier Combination
features:
UAV borne SATCOM Receiving & Transmission Combination

UAV borne SATCOM Receiving & Transmission Combination is comprised of modem unit, encryption & monitor unit and power supply unit. It is used for signal encryption, coding and decoding, modulation and demodulation, equipment monitor etc.

  • IF input frequency: 2.15GHz～3.95GHz, 1kHz stepping
  • IF output frequency: 2.5GHz～3.0GHz, 1kHz stepping
  • Receiving rate: 25.6kbps
  • Transmission rate: 2048kbps/4096kbps/8192kbps
  • Demodulation mode: DBPSK+DS
  • Modulation mode: DBPSK, QPSK
  • Dimension: 302mm×166mm×218mm (L×W×H)
  • Weight: ≤4.1kg
  • Power consumption: ≤60W
  • DC 28V

UAV borne SATCOM Receiving & Transmission Combination
form:
UAV borne SATCOM Antenna Combination

UAV borne SATCOM Antenna Combination is used to receive and transmit Ku band RF signal. It can automatically capture and track the satellite during the flight, and transmit equipment status information in real time.

  • Antenna caliber: parabolic 700mm×600mm
  • Operational frequency:Tx: 14.0GHz～14.5GHz;Rx: 10.95GHz～12.75GHz;
  • Gain:Tx: ≥37.1+20lg (f/14.25) dBi (f refers to operational frequency in GHz);Rx: ≥36.1+20lg (f/12.50) dBi (f refers to operational frequency in GHz);
  • First side-lobe level: ≤-14dB
  • Weight: ≤23kg
  • Power consumption: ≤80W
  • DC 28V

UAV borne SATCOM Antenna Combination
